text:
The Devcon Scholars Program made Devcon more accessible for 50 individuals with potential to make a positive impact on Ethereum! 

Learn more about their experiences and meet a few participants in the Devcon VI Scholars wrap-up post. Enjoy!

https://t.co/nZ8UKOzIpX

Devcon might be over but the Devcon Satellite grant application isnâ€™t yet!

Apply for the second round for Devcon Satellite grants. We are giving up to 1000 USD to gather with friends and rewatch Devcon talks with food!

Deadline: Nov 7. https://t.co/URCzPcrZyp
